text: Médière () is a commune in the Doubs department in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in eastern France. ==Geography== The commune is northeast of L'Isle-sur-le-Doubs on the banks of the Doubs. ==Population== ==Related pages== * Communes of the Doubs department ==References== ==Other websites== * Médière on the intercommunal Web site of the department Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Médière
